abstract: The hiring of a veteran antitrust lawyer represents the clearest indication that the Justice Department could be planning to mount a legal challenge to the deal, some analysts said.
snippet: The hiring of a veteran antitrust lawyer represents the clearest indication that the Justice Department could be planning to mount a legal challenge to the deal, some analysts said.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO  Is the Justice Department preparing to challenge a high-profile advertising partnership between Google and Yahoo?

headline.main: U.S. May Be Preparing Antitrust Suit in Google-Yahoo Partnership
headline.print_headline: U.S. May Be Preparing Antitrust Suit in Google-Yahoo Partnership

byline.original: By Miguel Helft and Stephanie Clifford
